alert.note: Alert for Alleghany; Ashe (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 1:54PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN ALLEGHANY...NORTHEASTERN ASHE COUNTIES IN NORTHWESTERNNORTH CAROLINA AND CENTRAL GRAYSON COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN VIRGINIA THROUGH 215 PM EDT... At 154 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Piney Creek, or near Mouth Of Wilson, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Independence... Mouth Of Wilson... Volney... Bridle Creek... Grassy Creek... Stratford... and Twin Oaks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
